Blog.post: some people are so immature. not in the good way that makes you feel happy and young again. i'm talking about the malicious kind of immaturity like gossiping about the dumbest stuff. case in point: at work this girl said she hate my coworker because (according to her) the girls feet looked like skis in her chucks and she's mad dusty. mad dusty ? whatthefxck??? she said she's mad dusty because her butt's always dirty from sitting on stuff that just so happen to be dirty. man. this girl has nothing to bother her. she needs a life. i asked her why she talks about ppl so much (a little is ok, but too much is just mean/stupid/immature/loser-ish). her word were, "i can say what i want, ain't nobody nowhere gon' do nothing and that's ma work na mean? dats ma word son. dat's ma word. ain't nobody up in here gon' do shit, na mean? dat's ma word. i keep it real, na mean? na mean? dat's ma word." i know what you mean. i got my name tag btw. it's official. funplex has just gotten more rabid .
sometimes i fuckin hate satilite tv. it's raining so no signal. i hate it. can't i just watch a show without it getting all pixilated? i don't ask for much. no. i don't. dammit.
urlLink look at his face and say it with me... what the hell . Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink click on the pic to read the nifty article. Posted by urlLink Hello

urlLink you remember those anime music videos by daft punk? well, they're all snippets from a movie. the movie is Interstella 5555. why so many 5's? because this movie is the "5tory of the 5ecret 5tar 5ystem. ahh! i've heard good stuff about this movie and i do like Leiji Matsumoto's work, so one day i will see it. yes. that is on my to do list. yes. ps~ i am sooo happy that the black guy in this is cute. black people in anime usually look like big lipped sea urchins... or something. Posted by urlLink Hello

today was my first day on the job @ funplex and let me tell you... boringggggg... since it was an orentation, there was a lot of talking. i mean, a LOT. 3 hours of talking to someone with a very short attention span. the manager took my drawing away...

if you were wondering where my head's at when it comes to my art, look no further than deviantART, where i keep some of my stuff. i updated recently. just cut and paste this to see my sheeeet... urlLink http://atari3000.deviantart.com y a y !

it was nice. then i went to MAC. that was nice too. i got some hot, teal mascara. my parents think that sorta stuff is weird. that's ok. i don't like country music. i saw a squirrel fall out of a tree . now that's weird. think about it. it's like me falling out of my house. you think he would be used to it by now, with all that jumping and climbing he does daily. dumb squirrel. i wonder if they have squirrels in dominica. it's dom/in/EEE/ka, not dom/IN/ica. that pisses dominicans off. all 53 of them. they're all like, "ya dumb people." i have no socks.

urlLink ...that's the only explanation for their amazing music. i'm not exaggerating... EVERY SINGLE TRAK is hot on this cd titled KishKash by Basement Jaxx. they're from the UK and they make the music that makes your RuMp magically shake. ah... you have to check out "Cish Cash", "Right Here's the Spot", "Plug It In", "Hot 'N' Cold"... just buy the DAMN cd! it's SO worth IT!!!! just cut and paste this to visit their official site ---> http://www.basementjaxx.co.uk/ ps~ turn your sPeakERs uP! pps~ meredith, i knew that evil look was authentic. i knew it! urlLink The Funplex Family Entertainment in Morris County endless noise. screaming kids. screaming parents. bright lights. sounds good to me --- that's why i applied at FunPlex. that's why i was hired at FunPlex. the manager just felt the rabies and said... "ok". YAY

urlLink VH1.com : Shows : I Love The 90s : Videos ah... why is micheal ian black so funny? i can't find any (good) pics of him on the net. man his sarcastic humor is so funny. he and mo rocca are my favorites. thanks for the posts. YAY

urlLink vh1.com many people have asked me, "oh, dear most gracious and loving ASHLEY, how oh how do i post a message? i do not possess a blog of my own... oh, help ME." to this i reply, just post a message anonymously by clicking "anonymous". YAY. i love the 90s!

urlLink a touch of class when i'm driving in my car i listen to my music. most people love the music that i listen to (only one person doesn't... ehem... no names...). one deejay/artists that i really like is a touch of class . they make, remix, compile music. they're really low key. i love em. you can download some free music from this site by right clicking and saving target (i dunno about you mac users, that info's for my pc peeps). it's there, if you're keen enough to find it.
urlLink Boners click the LiNk!! what's boners.com? funny/raunchy/random-ass pics. they're supposed to update everyday but sometimes they don't. YAY

urlLink i wish this would happen to me... imagine going to work everyday (ho hum) and on the side, you make music. you think it's just a silly hobby, no big deal. then someone (influential) hears it, and BAM... you're famous. that is french graphic designer Marc Nguyen Tan's (aka Colder) story. man, that's pretty sweet. on this album, "crazy love" is a stand out track. i'm smitten. urlLink

urlLink Fahrenheit 9/11 - Yahoo! Movies i just came back from watching mike moore's Fahrenheit 9/11 and let me tell you... it is not for the faint of heart. watching it, i felt a plethora of emotions. i felt saddened by the mind set of our government, happy that some truth was being told to the public so that they can make a more educated vote at the polls. and some parts of that movie was so hilarious ! i can see why it received the highest, most prestigious award at the Cannes Film Festival. i think we're seeing some history in the making. not just the film, but mike himself. i would like anyone to inform me of the last time a documentary was so popular at the box office. Documentaries are usually so boring like they chose topics of like, the mating habits of algae or something that's not that relevant to you or me (but then again, i don't really watch documentaries... so... yea). i had to write that this movie was money well spent (shit, for $9 something, it was well worth it).
urlLink sondre lerche is adorable. there's no other way to describe him. urlLink

i went to new york yesterday to get my hair did. on the train i met a writer whose coming out with a book about how faith (any kind of faith) helped women who were abused get through it. i thought that was kind of cool, but then she told me her name... cinderella. her name is cinderella . she showed me her drivers license and sure enough she was right. she was cool. while in n.y. my mom got a tattoo. NO NOT a REAL one, a henna tattoo. it was a very spiritual experience. i was like, whoa . henna. then some random ass dude came outta nowhere and was like, is that weed? is that hemp? the lady doing the tattoo was like, no it ain't hemp. what an idiot. whould ya look at this guy? what a IDIOT! can you use weed to color your skin? no? didn't think so. OH... and i never did get my hair done.

...i just came back from an interview with blockbuster. it went well, except for the fact that my interviewer said i might not get the job due to my long list of criminal activies that include 67 DUI's, possession of illigal substances (someone told me opium and mary jane were ok), and random cock fighting charges. but i remain hopeful and optimistic. you know what's a good song for all my peeps who like old music (70s)... lou christie's lightnin' strikes . it's so real .

...this little video by rob manuel. AH! it's SO RABID! this little masterpiece is entitled, "i like bukkake". if you don't know what bukkake is, don't go around saying it like you know. that's stupid. ask me, because if you search for bukkake on google, you'll get in trouble. you MOM AND DAD might find out!! OOOOH! k. http://albinoblacksheep.com/flash/bukkake.php urlLink

this is my first post. it's 3:07 am. i was just walking around thinking, "what's a blog?" i found out and i wanted one. so BOOYA GRANDMA... i got one. ok. i think i should go to sleep, but i'm not tired. ok. bye.
